actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a reasonable cause exception for the failure to make certain payments with respect to partnerships and S corporations not using a required taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an exception for the failure of partnerships and S corporations not using a required taxable year to make certain payments if such failure is due to reasonable cause and not due to willful neglect.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a reasonable cause exception for the failure to make certain payments with respect to partnerships and S corporations not using a required taxable year.
